description: Detects keywords from well-known PowerShell exploitation frameworks
author: Sean Metcalf (source)
Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Depending on the scripts, this rule might require some initial tunning to fit the environment
name: Malicious PowerShell Keywords
query: powershell.file.script_block_text:(*AdjustTokenPrivileges* OR /.*[Ii][Mm][Aa][Gg][Ee]_[Nn][Tt]_[Oo][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn][Aa][Ll]_[Hh][Dd][Rr]64_[Mm][Aa][Gg][Ii][Cc].*/ OR *Metasploit* OR /.*[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\.[Ww][Ii][Nn]32\.[Uu][Nn][Ss][Aa][Ff][Ee][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ii][Vv][Ee][Mm][Ee][Tt][Hh][Oo][Dd][Ss].*/ OR *Mimikatz* OR *MiniDumpWriteDump* OR /.*[Pp][Aa][Gg][Ee]_[Ee][Xx][Ee][Cc][Uu][Tt][Ee]_[Rr][Ee][Aa][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Rr][Ee][Aa][Dd][Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss][Mm][Ee][Mm][Oo][Rr][Yy]\.[Ii][Nn][Vv][Oo][Kk][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee]_[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ii][Ll][Ee][Gg][Ee]_[Ee][Nn][Aa][Bb][Ll][Ee][Dd].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]_[Dd][Ee][Ll][Ee][Gg][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Aa][Dd][Jj][Uu][Ss][Tt]_[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ii][Ll][Ee][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Aa][Ll][Ll]_[Aa][Cc][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Aa][Ss][Ss][Ii][Gg][Nn]_[Pp][Rr][Ii][Mm][Aa][Rr][Yy].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Dd][Uu][Pp][Ll][Ii][Cc][Aa][Tt][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Ee][Ll][Ee][Vv][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Ii][Mm][Pp][Ee][Rr][Ss][Oo][Nn][Aa][Tt][Ee].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Ii][Nn][Ff][Oo][Rr][Mm][Aa][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn]_[Cc][Ll][Aa][Ss][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Pp][Rr][Ii][Vv][Ii][Ll][Ee][Gg][Ee][Ss].*/ OR /.*[Tt][Oo][Kk][Ee][Nn]_[Qq][Uu][Ee][Rr][Yy].*/)
